snippet.title: The Desolation - Early Access Trailer | PC & Mobile Game
snippet.description:
This is The Desolation. Founders Sale Now On!

The Shade have impacted our world... it's time we made our own impact! 

The Desolation brings a complete cross-platform co-op looter-shooter experience to PC and mobile devices. Make your impact across endless procedurally generated worlds via cooperative action combat, deep build customization and richly satisfying tactical gameplay.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2358780/The_Desolation/

#mobilegame #pcgaming #indiegame
